snippet: In a speech, the new director, Richard Cordray, promised “real consequences” for companies that take unfair advantage of consumers of financial products.
abstract: Consumer Financial Protection Bureau director Richard Cordray outlines a vigorous oversight and enforcement agenda, promising 'real consequences' for companies that take unfair advantage of consumers of financial products.
lead_paragraph: In a speech, the new director, Richard Cordray, promised “real consequences” for companies that take unfair advantage of consumers of financial products.

headline.seo: Richard Cordray, New Consumer Chief, Promises Vigorous Agenda
headline.main: New Consumer Chief Promises Strong Agenda
headline.print_headline: New Consumer Chief Promises Strong Agenda

keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
